description: wrap-around skirt with white waistband with two loops; predominately blue and yellow; pleats; yellow silk ground; black trim; center panels, front and back, embroidered with blue flowers and multicolored butterflies; embroidered vertical blue flowers and stems on each pleat; trims with black ground fabrics embroidered with blue flowers and blue butterflies
